entity.name: Glific
entity.description:
Glific is an open source platform built to cater to the needs of the social sector, enabling two-way communication.

Its a Project Tech4Dev initiative, WhatsApp based chatbot, that boosts the reach and impact for NGOs.

PS: This is a dummy listing.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for details.

plans.name: Hosting support
plans.description: This will cover the monthly server hosting costs for the projects.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one developer working part-time on the projects.

plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.

history.description: Started accepting donations for the first time.
There was a dip, but we see this improving.
